entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
